H0.text: In the UK tv series ‘Mr Bean’, what model car does Mr Bean drive. Ford Escort

H3.text: In the UK tv series ‘Mr Bean’, what model car does Mr Bean drive. Mini

A4.text: Mr. Bean's vehicle, a citron-green 1977 British Leyland Mini 1000 Mark 4 with a matte black bonnet, was central to several antics
